Title: Syrup
Writer: Aram Rappaport (screenplay by), Max Barry (screenplay by), Max Barry (novel)
Actors: Juan Luis Acevedo, Kirstie Alley, Jolene Andersen, Max Barry
Plot: A slacker hatches a million-dollar idea. But, in order to see it through, he has to learn to trust his attractive corporate counterpart. Based on Max Barry's novel.
Production: Lila 9th Productions, The Boathouse, Windward Entertainment
